title: [SELT] Dell UltraSharp U2713HM 27 tommu IPS skjár

posts.text:
Er með flottan Dell UltraSharp U2713HM IPS tölvuskjá til sölu, 2560x1440 WQHD upplausn. 
Kostar nýr hjá Advania 139.990 kr
https://www.advania.is/vefverslun/vara/ ... (2560x1440
)-27-skjar/
Verðhugmynd  í kringum 85 þús.
GENERAL INFO
Packaged Quantity 1
Display Type LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
Diagonal Size 27 in
Viewable Size 27 in
Panel Type IPS
Aspect Ratio Widescreen - 16:9
Native Resolution 2560 x 1440 at 60 Hz
Pixel Pitch 0.23 mm
Brightness 350 cd/m2
Contrast Ratio 1000:1 / 2000000:1 (dynamic)
Color Support 16.7 million colors
Response Time 8 ms (gray-to-gray)
Horizontal Viewing Angle 178
Vertical Viewing Angle 178
Screen Coating anti-glare
Backlight Technology LED backlight
Features PowerNap
Dimensions (WxDxH) 25.2 in x 7.9 in x 16.7 in - with stand
Manufacturer : Dell, Inc.
CONNECTIVITY
Interfaces DVI-D (dual link) ( HDCP )
DisplayPort
HDMI
VGA
USB 3.0 upstream
4 x USB 3.0 downstream
Audio line-out
MECHANICAL
Display Position Adjustments height
Tilt Angle -4/+21
Flat Panel Mount Interface Yes
MISCELLANEOUS
Features security lock slot (cable lock sold separately)
Included Accessories cable tie
Microsoft Certifications Compatible with Windows 7
Compliant Standards TCO Displays
POWER
Power Supply internal
Power Consumption Operational 100 Watt
Power Consumption Stand by / Sleep 0.5 Watt
ENVIRONMENTAL STANDARDS
ENERGY STAR Qualified Yes
ENVIRONMENTAL PARAMETERS
Min Operating Temperature 32 °F
Max Operating Temperature 104 °F
Humidity Range Operating 10 - 80% (non-condensing)
SUSTAINABILITY
ENERGY STAR Qualified Yes
Endilega sendið tilboð með einkaskilaboðum....
Hann er keyptur fyrir ca. tveim árum síðan í október.
